definition: joseki (fixed opening pattern in go game)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: So is it correct English to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 所以我的答案是可以拆分不定式。

sentences.english: Underline the infinitives in the following sentences and tell their functions.
sentences.chinese: 用横线划出下列句子中的不定式，并说出它们的作用。

sentences.english: Is it OK to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 把不定式分开是否恰当？

sentences.english: The battery charges thru regenerative braking and thru stationary bicycling .
sentences.chinese: 其电池靠再生式刹车和固定式自行车运动来充电。

sentences.english: Challenge your brain by getting out of your routines and it will respond.
sentences.chinese: 离开你的定式来挑战你的大脑，它将有所反应。

sentences.english: China has also expanded school access, and moved away from learning by rote.
sentences.chinese: 中国还提高了入学率，走出了填鸭式教学的定式。

sentences.english: Essentially, there is no defined set of laws -- no formula -- that you must always follow.
sentences.chinese: 本质上，没有确定的规则，即没有定式可供你参照。

sentences.english: So, my answer is yes – it is OK to split infinitives.
sentences.chinese: 所以我的答案是可以拆分不定式。

sentences.english: Accidents of fixed derricks of the floating crane often occur in the seaway.
sentences.chinese: 固定式起重吊杆在海上出事故的情况经常发生。

sentences.english: An infinitive is a two-word form of a verb.
sentences.chinese: 一个不定式是由两个词构成的形式。

sentences.english: But, the type-A fire should be extinguished by using the fixed type hydrant extinguishing fire system.
sentences.chinese: 甲类火则使用固定式消防栓灭火系统灭火。

sentences.english: Voice is a property of clauses, and infinitives and gerunds form phrases.
sentences.chinese: 语态是从句的属性，不定式和动名词构成短语。

sentences.english: This paper presents a control method for a ladle residue cleaner in the Ma Steel Works.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了马钢固定式钢包钢渣清拆机的控制方法。

sentences.english: So is it correct English to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 那么拆分不定式到底行不行得通呢？

sentences.english: There can be a difference in meaning when the infinitive or the gerund is used after some verbs.
sentences.chinese: 某些动词后用不定式或动名词时，意思有不同。

sentences.english: Sometimess we use question words+to-infinitives to replace object clauses.
sentences.chinese: 有时我们用疑问词十动词不定式来代替宾语从句。

definition: established by popular usage (idiom); common usage agreement/customary convention
either this or that/one or the other
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
